@sjanemurf @julietoconnell It was agreed to review the pay and display scheme at the November budget meeting (that's the vote being referenced). Council officials then prepared a proposal, which went straight to public consultation, we didn't get to vote on it or amend it. I don't support the proposal.

@sjanemurf @julietoconnell This current scheme was proposed by officials before Christmas, not in November. Councillors didn't get a chance to vote on it or amend it before it went to public consultation. I won't be supporting it when it comes before the council.

@sjanemurf @julietoconnell Hiking parking rates in the Town & at DART car parks is the last thing we need.   Council officials proposed the increase before Christmas. Councillors didn't get an opportunity to vote on it or amend it before it went to public consultation. I won't be supporting the proposals
